text: María Esperanza Morelos Borja (born 29 September 1953) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. She has served as Deputy of the LIII and LX Legislatures of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: María Esperanza Morelos Borja
